name: 16th International Conference on Humanities, Psychology and Social Sciences
content: Learn more about the 16th International Conference on Humanities, Psychology and Social Sciences The 16th International Conference on Humanities, Psychology and Social Sciences is, by far, one of the most respected and prestigious social sciences conferences of the year. Full of immersive learning opportunities, HPSCONF is where the world of academia meets once a year to connect, engage in cross-border learning, share unique experiences and research, uncover trends, and get inspired. You will get a dose of inspiration that will power up your academic career to the next level!
